Mustafa Abubakar


He was born on the 8th of October, 2001 at New Atuabo, a suburb within the Tarkwa-Nsuaem Municipality. His parents are Mr. and Mrs. Abubakar./p>

Career

He started his footballing career with Barcelona Babies.

He had his basic education at New Atuabo Community Basic School (NATUCOBS), where he featured for the school team as a winger.

He continued his studies at Kwame Nkrumah Senior High in Nsein. He had his tertiary education at the University of Energy and Natural Resources (UENR).

He had his Islamic education at Ummul Qura, where he was awarded a Certificate of Completion of the recitation of The Holy Quran.

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a winger or attacker.

He enjoys playing volleyball and football at his leisure time.
